cards.question: 干
cards.meaning: to work; do; manage; tree trunk | to concern; shield; dry; clean (Kangxi radical 51)

cards.question: 抱
cards.meaning: to hold; to hug; carry in one's arms; to cradle

cards.question: 抱歉
cards.meaning: be sorry; feel apologetic; to regret

cards.question: 感觉
cards.meaning: to feel; become aware of; feeling

cards.question: 以
cards.meaning: to use; according to; so as to; for; by

cards.question: 与
cards.meaning: (formal) and; to give; together with; participate; final particle expressing doubt or surprise

cards.question: 弄
cards.meaning: do; manage; to handle; make | lane; alley

cards.question: 继续
cards.meaning: to continue; to go on; to proceed

cards.question: 刚
cards.meaning: just (indicating the immediate past); recently; firm

cards.question: 呀
cards.meaning: ah; oh; (used for 啊 after words ending with a, e, i, o, or ü)

cards.question: 只要
cards.meaning: so long as; if only; provided that

cards.question: 份
cards.meaning: part; portion; (mw for documents, papers, jobs, etc.)

cards.question: 到底
cards.meaning: after all; in the end (used in a question)

cards.question: 留
cards.meaning: to leave (behind, a message); to retain; to stay

cards.question: 停
cards.meaning: to stop; to halt; to park (a car)

cards.question: 从来
cards.meaning: have always (from the beginning); never (with negative)

cards.question: 赢
cards.meaning: to win; to beat; to profit

cards.question: 拉
cards.meaning: to pull; to play (string instruments); to drag | to slash; to chat

cards.question: 挺
cards.meaning: straighten up; stick out; rather (good); very

cards.question: 不管
cards.meaning: no matter (what, how, etc.); regardless of

cards.question: 甚至
cards.meaning: even (to the point of); so much so that

cards.question: 通过
cards.meaning: by means of; through (a method); pass through; via

cards.question: 开心
cards.meaning: feel happy; have a great time; make fun of somebody

cards.question: 倒
cards.meaning: to collapse; to fall; fail; to exchange | to pour; contrary to expectations

cards.question: 难道
cards.meaning: could it be that ...?; don't tell me ...

cards.question: 指
cards.meaning: finger; to point (at, to, out); refer to

cards.question: 提
cards.meaning: to carry; to lift; to raise (an issue)

cards.question: 重
cards.meaning: heavy; serious; important | repeat; again; overlap

cards.question: 任务
cards.meaning: a mission; an assignment; a task

cards.question: 使
cards.meaning: to use; to make; to cause; enable; envoy; messenger

cards.question: 转
cards.meaning: to turn; to change; pass on | revolve; rotate

cards.question: 对于
cards.meaning: regarding; as far as sth. is concerned; with regards to; for

cards.question: 遍
cards.meaning: a time; everywhere; turn; (mw for times or turns)

cards.question: 戴
cards.meaning: put on; to wear; to respect

cards.question: 随便
cards.meaning: as one pleases; informal; random; casual

cards.question: 支持
cards.meaning: sustain; hold out; | support; stand by (e.g. international support)

cards.question: 光
cards.meaning: light; ray; bright; only; merely; used up

cards.question: 首先
cards.meaning: first (of all); in the first place; firstly

cards.question: 交
cards.meaning: deliver; turn over; intersect; to pay (money); friendship

cards.question: 台
cards.meaning: platform; Taiwan (abbr.); desk; stage; typhoon; (mw for machines); (classical) you (in letters)

cards.question: 到处
cards.meaning: everywhere; in all places; all over

cards.question: 实在
cards.meaning: honest; in reality; honestly; indeed; certainly

cards.question: 输
cards.meaning: to transport; to lose (a game, etc.)

cards.question: 座
cards.meaning: (mw for mountains, bridges, tall buildings, etc.); | seat; base; stand; constellation

cards.question: 比如
cards.meaning: for example; for instance; such as

cards.question: 脱
cards.meaning: to shed; take off; to escape

cards.question: 使用
cards.meaning: to use; employ; apply; administer; manipulate

cards.question: 原来
cards.meaning: original; former; as it turns out

cards.question: 讨论
cards.meaning: to discuss; discussion; to talk over

cards.question: 受到
cards.meaning: receive (influence, restriction, etc.); be subjected to

cards.question: 拒绝
cards.meaning: to refuse; to decline; to reject

cards.question: 因此
cards.meaning: therefore; thus; that is why; because of this

cards.question: 不得不
cards.meaning: have to; have no choice but to; cannot but

cards.question: 无论
cards.meaning: no matter what; regardless of whether...

cards.question: 尽管
cards.meaning: despite; although; even though | freely; without hesitation

cards.question: 演出
cards.meaning: to act (in a play); to perform; to put on a show; performance

cards.question: 开玩笑
cards.meaning: joke; play a joke; make fun of

cards.question: 推
cards.meaning: to push; to scrape; to decline; postpone; elect

cards.question: 究竟
cards.meaning: after all; when all is said and done; actually

cards.question: 恐怕
cards.meaning: be afraid; to fear; I'm afraid that...

cards.question: 躺
cards.meaning: recline; lie down (on back or side)

cards.question: 聚会
cards.meaning: hold a meeting; get together; a party

cards.question: 接着
cards.meaning: continue; carry on; to catch; follow

cards.question: 正好
cards.meaning: just (in time); just right; just enough; happen to; by chance

cards.question: 提醒
cards.meaning: remind; call attention to; warn of

cards.question: 骄傲
cards.meaning: proud; arrogant; conceited; take pride in

cards.question: 节
cards.meaning: section; part; festival; moral integrity; save; (mw for class periods)

cards.question: 顺利
cards.meaning: go smoothly; without a hitch; successful

cards.question: 赚
cards.meaning: earn; make a profit | to cheat; to swindle

cards.question: 收拾
cards.meaning: to tidy; put in order; to repair; to settle with; punish

cards.question: 尊重
cards.meaning: esteem; to respect; to value; to honor

cards.question: 顺便
cards.meaning: conveniently; in passing; on the way

cards.question: 剩
cards.meaning: have as remainder; be left over; surplus

cards.question: 竟然
cards.meaning: unexpectedly; to one's surprise; go so far as to

cards.question: 引起
cards.meaning: give rise to; lead to; to cause; arouse

cards.question: 专业
cards.meaning: profession; specialized field of study; major

cards.question: 千万
cards.meaning: ten million; be sure to; must

cards.question: 由于
cards.meaning: due to; owing to; as a result of; thanks to

cards.question: 擦
cards.meaning: to wipe; to rub; to polish

cards.question: 干杯
cards.meaning: to drink a toast; cheers!; bottoms up!

cards.question: 可惜
cards.meaning: it's a pity; regrettable; too bad

cards.question: 响
cards.meaning: make a sound; to ring; echo

cards.question: 省
cards.meaning: to save; economize; omit; province | examine oneself; to visit; be aware

cards.question: 篇
cards.meaning: sheet; (mw for articles); piece of writing

cards.question: 吃惊
cards.meaning: be startled; be shocked; be amazed

cards.question: 按照
cards.meaning: according to; in accordance with; in light of

cards.question: 左右
cards.meaning: about; approximate; around | left and right

cards.question: 举行
cards.meaning: convene; to hold (a meeting, ceremony, etc.)

cards.question: 抬
cards.meaning: to lift; to raise (with both palms up); carry (together)

cards.question: 打扮
cards.meaning: dress up; put on make up

cards.question: 交流
cards.meaning: communicate; exchange; give and take; interaction; to alternate

cards.question: 符合
cards.meaning: in keeping with; in accordance with; conform

cards.question: 最好
cards.meaning: the best; had better ...; it would be best

cards.question: 提前
cards.meaning: shift to an earlier date; bring forward; to advance

cards.question: 整理
cards.meaning: put in order; arrange; straighten up; to tidy; to pack (luggage)

cards.question: 随着
cards.meaning: along with; in the wake of

cards.question: 偶尔
cards.meaning: occasionally; once in a while; sometimes

cards.question: 平时
cards.meaning: ordinarily; in normal times; in peacetime

cards.question: 对面
cards.meaning: opposite; across from; the other side

cards.question: 及时
cards.meaning: timely; in time; promptly; without delay

cards.question: 修理
cards.meaning: to repair; perform maintenance; to overhaul

cards.question: 参观
cards.meaning: to visit (a place, such as a tourist spot); inspect

cards.question: 逛
cards.meaning: to stroll; to visit; go window shopping

cards.question: 来不及
cards.meaning: there's not enough time (to do something); it's too late

cards.question: 减肥
cards.meaning: go on a diet; lose weight

cards.question: 缺少
cards.meaning: to lack; be short of; be deficient in

cards.question: 优点
cards.meaning: merit; good point; a strength; a benefit

cards.question: 往往
cards.meaning: often; frequently; more often than not

cards.question: 招聘
cards.meaning: recruitment; take job applications for a job

cards.question: 应聘
cards.meaning: accept a job offer; to apply for a job

cards.question: 长江
cards.meaning: the Yangtze River; the Changjiang River

cards.question: 预习
cards.meaning: (of students) prepare a lesson before class; preview

cards.question: 填空
cards.meaning: fill in the blanks; fill a vacancy
